pkgmetadata.longdescription: The IntelÂ® Fortran Compiler is a full features FORTRAN 77/95 and substantial FORTRAN 2003 compiler for Intel based architectures. It is here offered as a non-commercial (please see web site to see terms of qualifications). The compiler supports multi-threading, and processor support that includes automatic processor dispatch, vectorization, auto-parallelization, OpenMP, data prefetching, loop unrolling. The package come with a debugger and large documentation.
